scripts.install: cd ./home && npm i --force  && cd ../root && cd ../design-system npm i --force && npm i --
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd home; npm run dev" "cd root; npm run dev" "cd design-system; npm run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd home; npm run start" "cd root; npm run start"
scripts.build: cd ./home && npm run build && cd ../root && npm run build && cd ../design-system && npm run build
